title: Himi 206
lyrics:
4-6’s & 2-8’s
1.
Vakai, ko e me’a
Matalelei lahi,
‘A ‘etau nonofo
Fe’ofo’ofani
‘Oku lelei ki he ‘Eiki
‘A e fua ‘oku pehē.
2.
’Oka fakataha,
‘A e kakai tui,
‘Oku loto taha,
Pea lea lelei
Ko e me’a lelei lahi,
‘A ‘etau feohi pehē.
3.
Pea ka hokosi,
‘A e loto taha,
‘O mahalo taha.
Pea lea ‘ofa,
Ko eni ‘a e feohi,
‘Oku anga fakalotu.
4.
Ko e pani eni,
Ha’u mei ‘olunga,
Pea ko e lelei,
Fakalaumālie;
Kuo hifo mei he ‘Eiki,
Ki he’ene kakai tui.
5.
Pea ka hokosi,
‘O fe’ofa’aki,
‘E manongi atu
Hono namulelei
Ki he kakai kotoa pē,
Pea te nau mālie ai. *
